title: "Analysis Report"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

## Data Analysis

This report summarizes the analysis pipeline results.

### Model Summary

```{r}
#| label: model-summary
tar_read(model) |>
  summary()
```

### Visualization

```{r}
#| label: plot
#| fig-cap: "Scatter plot with model fit"
tar_read(plot)
```

### Data Summary

```{r}
#| label: data-summary
tar_read(processed_data) |>
  group_by(group) |>
  summarise(
    mean_y = mean(y),
    sd_y = sd(y),
    n = n()
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  tab_header(
    title = "Summary Statistics by Group"
  ) |>
  fmt_number(
    columns = c(mean_y, sd_y),
    decimals = 2
  )
```
